title: Women's Elegant Empire Waist Long Sleeve Satin Maxi Dress
description: Modest Round Neckline;Back Zip Closure;Hand wash;Iron at max 90 degree

Satin fabric has no stretch. Please carefully check the body measurements in the size chart to choose the right size. For example, if you are considering size XL, but any one of your measurements exceeds the size range, such as your bust being larger than 41" or your hips larger than 43.5", the fit will be tight or may not fit at all.
